players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I believe Charlie is the mafia; he killed Diana last night. Vote him out."
Charlie: "I had no reason to kill Diana. I was with Bob that night. Maybe he did it."
Bob: "Charlie was with Bob when Diana died. He could have killed her. Alice also points to him. That makes Charlie the likely mafia. Vote Charlie."
You: "Charlie is the mafia—Diana was killed last night, I investigated him and Bob also points to him. Vote Charlie to end this."
Bob: remained silent.
Charlie: "your message"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Charlie was arrested
